title: CONRADI HERESBACHII IC.|| De educandis atque erudiendis || PRINCIPVM LIBERIS,|| REI PVBLICAE GVBER=||NANDAE DESTINATIS,|| Déque Rebublica Christianè || administranda,|| LIBRI DVO.|| Quibus accesserunt || IOAN: IOVIANI PONTANI,|| IOAN: STVRMII,|| FRANCISCI PETRARCHAE,|| ERASMI ROTERODAMI,|| ALIORVMQVE ID GENVS AVTORVM || opuscula cognitu dignissima.|| ... || (PHILIPPI BERO/||ALDI DE PRINCIPE || ET PRINCIPIS || OFFICIO,||)

subject: Historische Drucke
